headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https: data: blob: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https: wss:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' https: data: blob:; font-src 'self' https: data:; frame-src 'self' https:;
